Name: TheDark
About the game: TheDark is a single player and online multiplayer survival game set in a post-apocalyptic open world, With an open dungeon system that anyone can enter that meets the requirements , join and grind xp and materials from the zombies or continue to pvp inside where you will find rare resources, Fight along side your fellow survivors or against them the choice is yours, Go hunting for fresh meat from the roaming deer or go and hunt the zombies that plague the world.. Battle your way through the horde with melee weapons! Or just simply arm yourselves!
